moves.name: Ice Punch
moves.description: The target is punched with an icy fist. It may also leave the target frozen.

moves.name: Powder Snow
moves.description: The user attacks with a chilling gust of powdery snow. It may also freeze the targets.

moves.name: Leer
moves.description: The opposing team gains an intimidating leer with sharp eyes. The opposing team's Defense stats are reduced.

moves.name: Razor Leaf
moves.description: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the opposing team. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Icy Wind
moves.description: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. It also reduces the targets' Speed stat.

moves.name: Razor Leaf
moves.description: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at the opposing team. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Icy Wind
moves.description: The user attacks with a gust of chilled air. It also reduces the targets' Speed stat.

moves.name: Grass Whistle
moves.description: The user plays a pleasant melody that lulls the target into a deep sleep.

moves.name: Swagger
moves.description: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, it also sharply raises the target's Attack stat.

moves.name: Mist
moves.description: The user cloaks its body with a white mist that prevents any of its stats from being cut for five turns.

moves.name: Ice Shard
moves.description: The user flash freezes chunks of ice and hurls them at the target. This move always goes first.

moves.name: Ingrain
moves.description: The user lays roots that restore its HP on every turn. Because it is rooted, it can't switch out.

moves.name: Wood Hammer
moves.description: The user slams its rugged body into the target to attack. The user also sustains serious damage.

moves.name: Blizzard
moves.description: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike the opposing team. It may also freeze them solid.

moves.name: Sheer Cold
moves.description: The target is attacked with a blast of absolute-zero cold. The target instantly faints if it hits.
